Note: Paddy Belton (FG) holds the seat vacated by the death of his brother Jack Belton (FG)
Noël Browne (NPD) disbands the National Progressive Democrats and joins the Labour Party
Jack McQuillan (NPD) disbands the National Progressive Democrats and joins the Labour Party
Seán Dunne (Ind) joins the Labour Party
Sheila Galvin (FF) wins the seat vacated by the death of her husband John Galvin (FF)
